item.description:
I saw this movie at a free preview and liked it enough to see it again. While some of the elements are predictable, the cast is stellar and watching them in action is a real treat.

More information: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1412386/
Starring: Judi Dench, Bill Nighy, Maggie Smith, Tom Wilkinson, Penelope Wilton, Celia Imrie, Dev Patel, and Tena Desae. Directed by John Madden.
118-124 minutes, depending upon which summary you read.

NOTE: Time may change, depending upon the cinema's schedule. I chose a time based upon this week's schedule. If people prefer Sunday evening, let me know and I can shift to Sunday. At last night's movie, the consensus was that Saturday is more do-able.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel"
